attributes.action: Expand the Merseyrail service to a new station outside the new anfield development, Liverpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i believe that there should be a station outside liverpools new stadium as this will improve convinience and ease congestion therefore helping to cut down CO2 emmissions.
furthermore, if many other large stadiums have their own rail stations, i see no real reason why liverpool FC should be exempt from this convenience to fans, and it will bring more jobs to the community
